clone.chooseFolderTitle: Choose a folder to clone xous-core into
clone.instructionsAfterOpen: Open the repo, clone locally, then try again.
clone.openRepoFallback: Opening repo in browser. After cloning locally, select the folder in settings.
flash.deviceNotFoundDetailed:
Device not found at {0}

• Is the board plugged in?
• Is the board in bootloader mode? (press RESET on the board)

Select "Continue" if the device appears after checking cable and pressing RESET.

Otherwise, select a new location for the BAOCHIP device.
flash.locationMissing: Flash location not found: {0}  Is the board mounted? Make sure the board appears as a drive, press RESET if needed.
flash.noUf2s: No UF2s found (loader/xous/apps). Build first, then flash.
flash.selectDriveInstructions:
You need to select the drive where your baochip is mounted.

1) Make sure your baochip is plugged in.
2) If you cannot see the BAOCHIP drive on your computer, press the RESET button and wait for the drive to appear.

uv.notFoundWin: uv was installed but not found. Ensure your Python user Scripts directory is on PATH or select a different Windows Python.
uv.reset: Baochip: reset uv setup for this workspace. Re-run a command to reconfigure.
